meanings.definition: The quality or state of being seasonal.
meanings.sent1: The seasonality of the flowers changing colors in autumn is truly beautiful.
meanings.sent2: I love the seasonality of fresh fruits and vegetables at the farmer's market.
meanings.sent3: The seasonality of the snow falling in summer would be quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: Her paintings captured the seasonality of nature with vibrant hues and changing landscapes.
meanings.sent5: The seasonality of the leaves turning from green to red made the forest look like a painting.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of occurring at a certain time of year.
meanings.sent1: The seasonality of holiday decorations appearing in stores always brings joy.
meanings.sent2: The seasonality of cherry blossoms blooming in spring is a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: Imagine the seasonality of a snowman melting in the middle of July!
meanings.sent4: The seasonality of school starting in September marks the end of summer fun.
meanings.sent5: The seasonality of fireworks lighting up the sky on the Fourth of July is unforgettable.
